detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LiquidityAccess.payback(address,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#615-635):
	External calls:
	- _amt = getUint(getId,amt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#616)
		- returnVal = MemoryInterface(getMemoryAddr()).getUint(getId) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#512)
	- _transfer(address(address(getDydxFlashAddr())),tokenContract,totalFeeAmt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#623)
		- returndata = address(token).functionCall(data,SafeERC20: low-level call failed) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#434)
		- token.safeTransfer(to,_amt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#530-532)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call.value(weiValue)(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#354)
	- setUint(setId,totalFeeAmt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#625)
		- MemoryInterface(getMemoryAddr()).setUint(setId,val) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#519)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _transfer(address(address(getDydxFlashAddr())),tokenContract,totalFeeAmt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#623)
		- to.transfer(_amt) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#530-532)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call.value(weiValue)(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#354)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LogDydxFlashPayback(tokens,amts,totalFeeAmts) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ConnectDydxFlashloan.sol#634)
